pr_title: Optimize the logic for getting TabletMeta from TabletInvertedIndex to reduce frequency of getting read lock

timeline.message: Reduce frequency to get read lock
Reduce frequency to get read lock in TabletInvertIndex

timeline.bodyText: Have you tested its performance? There may be millions of tablet in tabletIds. I am not sure how long it will take to process that much of tablets.
timeline.author: morningman

replies.bodyText: cost for getting a list of size for 1000000 from map  is about 40 ~ 50ms, here we only process tablets in one be and which need to sync, so i think  1000000 for testing is large enough
replies.author: caiconghui

timeline.bodyText:
It is very error-prone to result a list will null in it.
How about using getOrDefault() method, and return an NonExistTabletMeta is not found?
And NonExistTabletMeta can be a final static member with all id as NON_EXIST_VALUE in it.
In this way, we don't have to check null each time we visit the returned list.
timeline.author: morningman
morningman
